title: Unable to play PvP
body: I stopped playing LoL a few months ago but I started playing again a few days ago, and when I try to join a PvP game, it doesnt find a match and I can only play Co-op vs AI, any suggestions on what might be wrong?

replies.body:
It sounds like you may have issues keeping a steady connection to the PvP.net service, which is in charge of giving you queue pops and communicating with other players. I recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local settings are good.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
Can you clarify what you mean by "it doesn't find a match"?
